entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Havre St-Pierre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:56 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Havre St-Pierre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:09 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Havre-Saint-Pierre Airport 9:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: ENE 37 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 70 gusting to 100 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow changing to rain and ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 100 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
